title: LIVING IN THE HEART OF THE CITY IS GOOD FOR YOUR HEART
posting_body: ['Monaco Park', '8350 West Desert Inn Road, Las Vegas, NV, 89117', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 47', 'OR Text', '47', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'WHERE LUXURY IS A WAY OF LIFE', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1020 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Meet Monaco Park, a modernized apartment community where luxury is felt.', 'We may not be stretched along the coastline of the Mediterranean Sea, but we have our own little slice of the French Riviera on West Desert Inn in Spring Valley, Las Vegas.', 'With two resort-styled pools, gated access, and options for private detached garages – we’ve carefully designed this living experience for the sophisticated.', 'Pet Policy', 'We Love Pets!', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Tuesday:11:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'C4dSiRB77BW']
